enrichedWines.description: A Languedoc red blend from Maison Ventenac, named after founder Pierre. This wine showcases the warm Mediterranean climate and diverse terroir of southern France with ripe fruit and herbal complexity.

tastingNotes.aroma: Rich and expressive with aromas of dark cherry, blackberry, and plum, layered with notes of garrigue herbs—rosemary, thyme, and lavender. Hints of black olive, leather, and sweet spice add complexity. The nose shows Mediterranean warmth and character.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with supple tannins and balanced acidity. The palate delivers concentrated dark fruit—blackberry, cassis, and plum—with savory elements of olive tapenade, herbs, and earth. Notes of mocha and vanilla from oak aging add depth. The wine is rich yet balanced.
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit, soft tannins, and herbal notes. The Mediterranean character shines through.

enrichedWines.description: A playful rosé from Aratas, known for their bold single-vineyard wines. The 'Surreptitious' name suggests a secretive or unexpected pleasure—a serious winery's fun take on rosé.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright and fresh with aromas of strawberry, watermelon, and red cherry, complemented by subtle citrus and floral notes. Hints of herbs and minerality add complexity.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity and dry profile. Vibrant red berry flavors with citrus zest and mineral backbone. Refreshing and balanced with subtle phenolic grip.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering berry fruit and mineral notes.

enrichedWines.productName: Black Elephant Vintners Three Men in a Tub with a Rubber Duck Blend 2023
enrichedWines.description: A whimsically named South African red blend showcasing the playful side of serious winemaking. Black Elephant Vintners is known for creative labels and quality wines that over-deliver for the price.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fruit-forward with ripe berry aromas, subtle spice, and herbal notes characteristic of South African reds.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with soft tannins. Juicy red and dark fruit with hints of spice and earth. Approachable and food-friendly.

enrichedWines.description: An Argentine Malbec from Bodegas Gieco's Special Selection range, showcasing ripe fruit concentration and oak aging from premium vineyard sites.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bold with aromas of ripe plum, blackberry, and dark cherry, layered with vanilla, mocha, and sweet spice from oak aging. Hints of violet and chocolate add complexity.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins. Concentrated dark fruit flavors with notes of chocolate, coffee, and spice. Rich texture with balanced acidity.
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and soft oak spice.

enrichedWines.productName: Wonderment Wines Bacigalupi Old Vine Zinfandel 2016
enrichedWines.description: A premium old-vine Zinfandel from the legendary Bacigalupi Vineyard in Russian River Valley, one of Sonoma's most historic sites. Wonderment's minimal intervention approach showcases the vineyard's unique character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Complex with ripe blackberry, raspberry, and cherry, layered with notes of bramble, black pepper, and baking spices. Hints of tobacco, leather, and earth from age and old vines.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins and vibrant acidity. Concentrated dark fruit with savory notes of earth, spice, and herbs. Excellent depth from old vines.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with persistent fruit and spice.

wineDetails.region: Bacigalupi Vineyard, Russian River Valley, California

enrichedWines.productName: Chateau Maris Nymphe De Emue Rose 2024
enrichedWines.description: A fresh biodynamic rosé from Chateau Maris in Languedoc, part of their playful 'Nymphe' range. Made with minimal intervention and no added sulfites.

tastingNotes.aroma: Vibrant with fresh strawberry, raspberry, and citrus. Floral notes and herbal complexity from biodynamic farming.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Pure red berry fruit with mineral backbone and refreshing finish.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, energetic finish with bright acidity.

enrichedWines.productName: Domaine du Joncier L'O de Joncier 2019
enrichedWines.description: A premium wine from Domaine du Joncier in Lirac, Rhône Valley. The 'L'O de Joncier' designation suggests their top cuvée with extended aging and selection.

tastingNotes.aroma: Complex with dark fruit, garrigue herbs, olive, and spice. Notes of leather and earth from aging.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins. Concentrated dark fruit with savory Rhône character—herbs, earth, and pepper.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with persistent fruit and spice.

enrichedWines.description: A young, fresh Spanish red from Abadia de Acon. 'Joven' means young, indicating minimal aging for fresh fruit character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright with fresh cherry, plum, and berry aromas. Subtle herbal notes.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins and vibrant acidity. Juicy red fruit flavors. Approachable and fresh.

enrichedWines.description: An Oregon Chardonnay from Phelps Creek Vineyards in the Columbia Gorge, showcasing cool-climate elegance and balanced oak influence.

tastingNotes.aroma: Elegant with citrus, green apple, and white peach. Notes of hazelnut and subtle oak. Mineral undertones.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Citrus and stone fruit flavors with creamy texture and mineral backbone. Well-integrated oak.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, clean finish with citrus and mineral notes.

enrichedWines.productName: Noble Hill Sur Lie Chenin Blanc 2023
enrichedWines.description: A South African Chenin Blanc aged on lees for added complexity and texture from Noble Hill estate in Stellenbosch.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromatic with pear, green apple, and citrus. Floral notes and subtle honey. Lees aging adds brioche character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with vibrant acidity. Citrus and stone fruit with creamy texture from lees. Mineral backbone.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, refreshing finish with citrus and mineral notes.

wineDetails.style: Sur lie Chenin Blanc with texture
